author: andy
msg: + Fix caching of last read trasnaction. JENA-299
+ Read txns do not now flush the delayed write queue immediately.
forces a the delayed write queue to main database if no transactions active.

author: sebb
msg: Update Maven changes version (can be dropped when CP26 is released)

author: veithen
msg: Fixed the qnameAliasMap stuff. It was not exactly working as expected because Axiom resets the namespace information after an element has been created. Moved the logic to FOMStAXFilter so that QName aliasing is entirely transparent to Axiom. Also added a test case.
